translations: n.多载集合；负荷过重（overload 的复数）
v.使超载（overload 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 信息过载；信息超载；信息超负荷
热继电器；热过载继电器
过载保护器；超负荷保险装置
过载继电器；超载替续器

sentences.sentence: Along with the name changes, many overloads have also been changed.
sentences.translation: 随着名称的修改，许多重载也随之被修改。

sentences.sentence: When the power grid overloads, fiction becomes fact for a short time.
sentences.translation: 当电网超载时，小说中的情节在现实中短暂出现。

sentences.sentence: Avoid running into resource overloads that can result in system crash.
sentences.translation: 避免出现可能导致系统崩溃的资源过载。
